title: Interpretation of seeing yourself sitting at a table in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of sitting at the table in a dream through the vision website roy2a.com. It is considered one of the customs that many people follow until now, which is gathering around the table and eating, especially on holidays and happy occasions. Today, through this article, we will present to you the interpretation of seeing yourself sitting at a table. In a dreamFor great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us.Interpretation of seeing yourself sitting at the table in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained the vision of sitting at a table with friends in a dream. It indicates the priest’s trip outside his homeland soon in order to live and work.Seeing the dreamer sitting On the table, but his hand did not reach the food in the dream. It indicates that the dreamer has faced many failures in his life. The table in a dream. It indicates that the dreamer lives a life full of stability and happiness. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing trees falling in a dream. Interpretation of seeing them sitting at the table in a dream for a single woman. Vision A single woman is sitting in a dream at a table full of different foods. It shows that she is a distracted girl and that there are many wishes that she wants to fulfill. Sitting at an empty table in a dream shows that this period is going through financial difficulties. The white table in a single woman’s dream indicates that he will get married soon, and God knows best. See Other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing animal feces in a dream Interpretation of seeing a woman sitting at a table in a dream for a married woman Seeing a married woman sitting at the table in a dream It indicates that you are living a cohesive family life full of love and happiness. Sitting at a table full of food in a dream for a married woman shows that she will achieve many of her goals And her ambitions in life. Preparing for a big celebration in a dream for a married woman shows that a lot of good things have happened in her life. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing grass in a dream. Interpretation of seeing sitting at a table in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman sitting at a white table in a dream shows that she will soon undergo childbirth. Sitting at a small table in a dream for a pregnant woman, and this indicates that she will give birth to a girl, and God knows best. A bank chair in a dream for a pregnant woman announces that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a table in a dream: Seeing food on the table in a dream indicates many happy events in the dreamer’s practical life. A lot of food on the table in a dream. It indicates that the dreamer is living a happy life full of goodness, blessings, and stability. Sharing a table with the dead in a dream. It indicates that God will bless the dreamer with a lot of goodness, sustenance, and good luck in his life. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a rock in a dream. Interpretation of seeing Determination in a dream: Seeing the intention of a wedding in a dream indicates many happy occasions in the dreamer’s life during the following period. Determination in the desert in a dream specifies the dreamer’s journey in the coming period. Seeing the dreamer establishing determination in the dream indicates that God will alleviate distress.

title: The interpretation of seeing a pencil in a dream has different interpretations

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a pencil in a dream has different interpretations. The pencil is one of the tools used for writing, and it comes in many shapes and sizes. The pencil is made of wood and lead. Seeing a pencil in a dream has many different meanings and interpretations that are mentioned through interpretive words in their books, they often indicate the high scientific, religious and legal status of the priest. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a pencil in a dream with different interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pencil in a dream When the dreamer sees a pencil in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will succeed and excel in his studies. Also, when the dreamer sees a pencil in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer is a person interested in science and interested in reading, as he seeks to learn poetry and learn literature. When the dreamer sees a pencil in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer is a person interested in collecting information, and the vision also shows that the dreamer is a person who loves investigation. • As the dreamer sees a pencil in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer has great abilities in science. When the dreamer sees a pencil in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will soon become one of the greatest and most important poets or writers, and has enormous potential in these fields. When the dreamer sees a mechanical pencil in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will pass He is going through a difficult period in his life that will cause him a lot of problems. When the dreamer sees a mechanical pencil in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will have disagreements and competition with one of the people, but this problem and competition will end after reaching the appropriate solution. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pencil in a dream When the dreamer sees that he has taken Pencil in a dream, it may mean that the dreamer will have a good understanding of his actions and obligations. Also, when the dreamer sees that he is taking a pencil in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be able to overcome the adversities that befall him in his life. When the dreamer sees that he is taking a pencil in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will He will be able to reach a high position and achieve excellence in his work by helping someone close to him in this. regards. Also, when the dreamer sees himself picking up a pencil in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer needs help in the work environment so that he can achieve excellence and distinction in his career. Interpretation of the dream in which you see writing an article with a pencil in a dream. When the dreamer sees himself writing an article with a pencil in a dream. The dream itself writes articles with a pencil in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be able to make a truce with his enemies, which will improve his work. Also, when the dreamer sees himself writing articles using a pencil in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will achieve progress in his work in the coming period with an increase in his financial profits.• When the dreamer sees that he finds...

title: Interpretation of seeing a policeman in a dream in detail

preview.html: In the following article, we show you the interpretation of seeing a policeman in a dream, according to what was interpreted by the great scholar Ibn Sirin. Often people see police or guards in their dreams and do not know what this vision means. We are confused as to whether this dream has a clear meaning or is it just psychological concerns that have no meaning or meaning. Interpretation scholars provide many clues that explain this vision, but it is worth noting that the interpretation of the dream varies depending on the condition of the person who sees it, so we will explain to you through the following encyclopedia article the interpretation of the dream about the police seeing an unmarried girl who is pregnant and married. The policeman in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the police in Dream by Ibn Sirin The respected scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the police in a dream indicates security and stability in the life of the dreamer. The police entering a house in a dream indicates the joy and pleasure that will enter this house, and it is also a sign that indicates solving problems and getting rid of them. Seeing the police calling The name of the fortuneteller in a dream indicates the fulfillment of his desires in life and also indicates that the dreamer’s life will change for the better. If the sleeper dreams that policemen are running around him, this is a sign that he is committing sins and following desires, and that the dreamer is moving away from the straight path. To see that the police are accusing you of committing crimes If you have not done it in your life, this means that there are many enemies who seek to harm you in your life. Dreaming of being chased by the police and the dreamer running away from them indicates that the dreamer is escaping from the goals he seeks to achieve. If the sleeper dreams of stars on the shoulders of the policeman, this is a sign that he will achieve success. But after a long time. If the sleeper dreams that the police arrest him, this is a sign that the dreamer will marry a woman who will exhaust him in life. Seeing the police in a single woman’s dream. The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the police in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the arrival of joy and happiness in her life and that Her goals will be achieved. One jurist says that the dream of the police in the dream of an unmarried girl shows the problems that she suffers from in her life and that she suffers from loneliness. Seeing the police in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she is a brave and courageous girl capable of punishing those who wronged her in the past. Fear of the police In the dream of an unmarried girl, it indicates the problems that she will face in the coming days. The police in a dream for a married woman. The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that if a married woman sees in her dream that the police are arresting her husband, then this vision indicates that her husband is a reckless man who does not respect good behavior, and that she is worried. Therefore, seeing the police chasing the dreamer’s husband in her dream without being able to catch him is a vision that explains the differences that exist in this woman’s home between her and her husband, but God Almighty will help them resolve them. One of the jurists says that seeing the police entering a married woman’s home in a dream means that she She will regain something she lost, and seeing children being arrested indicates that her children are righteous. If a married woman sees in her dream that her husband is arguing with the police, this is a sign of failure.

title: Interpretation of ice cream and ice cream in a dream for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman

preview.html: Seeing ice cream means happiness, success, and other interpretations that we will explain to the single, married, pregnant, and divorced man, such as seeing ice cream in a dream and eating white ice cream or buying blankets with chocolate, milk, or strawberries from a son. Sirin and others in continuation of the topic. Interpretation of ice cream in a dream. Ice cream is a rare phenomenon in dreams and is one of the symbols that indicate success and happiness in matters of privacy and the environment. To see yourself eating ice cream in a dream means regaining recognition, success, and adequacy in life. The vision of getting ice cream indicates... Exchange ice cream into new friendships and serious relationships with the environment. Ice cream also indicates that the work you are doing will be very profitable. Spoiled ice cream in a dream indicates disappointment, sadness and betrayal. Continuous ice cream in a dream indicates failure to achieve your true desires and aspirations. In life. Eating ice cream in a dream indicates happy success, especially in the field of commerce. Seeing children eating ice cream indicates prosperity and happiness. Seeing yourself eating ice cream in general indicates achievement, overcoming obstacles, and achieving what is desired, as well as showing comfort in matters. The life and happiness that the viewer lives with. If the vision is of ice cream melted by heat, then the vision indicates a failure to achieve some of the things that the visionary seeks. Whoever sees in his dream that he is eating ice cream or ice cream, his vision indicates his success. In his commercial life and that his art will bring him abundant profit from some deals that were made in the past. And the engaged girl who sees in her dream that she destroyed ice cream or ice cream in her dream, and that the situation was in the presence of her fiancé, then the vision shows the separation that could occur between them because The cruelty of her actions. And whoever sees in his dream a group of children eating and eating ice cream or ice cream, the vision shows the joy and happiness that overwhelms the life of the fortuneteller. And ice cream that tastes sour in a dream, and seeing it indicates worries, sorrows, and heartaches. Spoiled ice cream or Ice cream in a dream indicates heartbreak and betrayal from a relative or indicates failures that the dreamer is exposed to in his life. Interpretation of ice cream in a dream for a single woman: Seeing ice cream for an unmarried girl is considered a happy vision for her. However, its meaning may not indicate happiness. If she is engaged, this indicates her separation from her fiancé, and if she buys ice cream, this means that there is a meaning between them to reach the point of separation, even if the spoiled ice cream symbolizes disappointment, sadness, and failure to achieve her dreams. And when she sees in her dream that children are eating ice cream, this indicates her happy life, and that she will achieve her dreams. Interpretation of ice cream in a married woman’s dream: As for seeing ice cream in a married woman’s dream, if it is fresh, this indicates the fulfillment of many of the ambitions he seeks, whether In his life

title: Interpretation of ants in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Shedding light on a little interpretation of ants in a dream: abundance of sustenance and profit, there are some other interpretations that indicate bad conditions and changing stable conditions in which the dreamer will find himself, and this differs between an unmarried girl, a woman, a divorced woman, or a man, each of them has different interpretations.Interpretation Seeing ants in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. We will find different interpretations of ants in a dream through the website: Where the scholar Ibn Sirin said: Seeing many ants in a dream indicates righteous people. And if many ants come in a sick person’s dream, they will remain in his death, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. And if the ants come out In a dream with food, this indicates the dreamer’s poverty. If one sees in a dream that ants are coming out of his mouth and stomach, this means that his period is approaching. As ants generally indicate the abundance of sustenance or earning money through halal ways. Read also: Interpretation of dogs in a dream in detailInterpretation of a vision Ants in a dream in the bedIf a sexy man sees a dream of ants in his bed, this vision indicates that he will find a new job that is better than his old job. Interpretation of ants in a dream in the bed indicates abundant sustenance and earning money. The more ants in the bed, the greater the livelihood and profits. If a person sees in a dream that ants bite him during pregnancy, then this vision indicates the collapse of the worries and anxieties present in the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing red ants in a dream in bed. If red ants come in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer may be going through a psychological problem or a health crisis. Red ants in a dream indicate the destruction of emotional relationships or the emergence of financial crises for the dreamer. Interpretation of red ants in a dream in a married woman’s bed indicates pregnancy. Red ants in a man’s dream in his bed while he is married to a woman he loves, indicates the doubts that have entered into this relationship. And many arguments. Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of ants in a dream: A single girl says that she is with bad friends. Ants in an unmarried girl’s dream indicate that her closest friends are setting a trap for her. As the scholar Ibn Sirin said about ants in an unmarried girl’s dream, Many refer to her wasting money. Red ants in an unmarried girl’s dream indicate a man who loves her and wants to be officially associated with her. If an unmarried girl dreams of many ants in her bed, this means that she will marry someone she loves. Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of ants In a dream, when a married woman shows a lot of money. Black ants on the bed in a married woman’s dream indicate that she will soon become pregnant with a new baby, as the child will be a boy. Also, a large number of black ants in the bathroom in a married woman’s dream indicates poverty and a lot of debt on her, and she may incur some Material losses. Termites in a married woman’s bed in a dream indicate that she will soon become pregnant with a new baby who will be a female. Read also: Interpretation of seeing pregnancy in a dream for a married woman by senior imams of interpretation. Interpretation of seeing ants in a drunk person’s dream. If a bitter person sees

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person buried in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dead person buried in a dream Death is the opposite of life, and it is the exit of the soul from the body to its Creator, and every person has a fixed state like all other creatures. Interpretation of seeing the burial of the dead in a dream, whether the vision is for a single, married, pregnant or divorced woman, and we will present it today through a vision that we discuss in detail, based on the opinion of senior commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq or contemporary interpreters, follow us on the Vision website. Interpretation of a dream of burying the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing a dead person presenting a living person in a dream indicates the need to correct the path and change the behavior of the seer and return to God. Seeing him crying over the dead indicates the end of anxiety and the recovery of the patient. Looking at him as if he is alive and not dead indicates the high status of the deceased in the afterlife and may indicate the inheritance of the living. What is the interpretation of seeing the burial of the dead in a dream for a man? If a person sees that he is dead and dies again, this indicates the marriage of a young man or an unmarried girl. Seeing a naked death in a man’s dream indicates poverty and need for the visionary. What is the interpretation of seeing the burial of the dead In a dream for a single woman? If a girl sees that she is dead, it says that her marriage is approaching. If a girl sees that the dead person dies again, it indicates marriage to a relative of the deceased or his offspring, and perhaps the relatives of the deceased and their interests will benefit from him. Seeing a dead person shrouded while he is really alive indicates hostility and strife and cuts off friendly relations. What is the interpretation of seeing the burial of the dead in a dream for a married woman? Seeing the washing of the dead in a dream for a married woman indicates recovery from illness if she is sick, and the dream may indicate the arrival of charity to the dead. If a married woman sees the death of someone she knows, she will die a horrific death. This may indicate a disaster or misfortune for the viewer. What is the interpretation of seeing the burial of the dead in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing the burial of the dead in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the nearest birth. Seeing a dead friend die again without mourning in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the cessation of worries and problems and the ease of childbirth. What is the interpretation of seeing the burial of the dead in a dream for a divorced or widowed woman? If a divorced or widowed woman sees his death, this indicates the end of sadness and pain and the beginning of a new, better life, and death when the patient sees it indicates her death. If she sees The widow that her husband gave her a will, and this indicates a touch of goodness and happiness, may God bless her and her children. What is the interpretation of a dream about reburying the dead? Seeing a man die indicates longevity and a new job or moving to a new home. Seeing a dead person buried again may indicate the death of someone from the deceased's family or the emergence of an inheritance. What is the interpretation of a dream about burying the dead inside the house? Seeing death for a young man announces his marriage as well as an unmarried girl. Seeing someone die without crying or screaming indicates that you will hear good news. What is the interpretation of seeing the burial of an unknown dead person in a dream for a single woman? Seeing the dead is followed by screaming and lamentation, which portends disasters and calamities in the dreamer's life. Whoever sees that he has died, washes, wraps and buries, may indicate the evil of the dreamer and the abundance of sins and disobedience. We are happy

title: The most important interpretations of dreaming about a gold ring by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: So far, dreaming of a gold ring concerns many men and women, especially girls, in their dreams, and we find that each of them, when translated, finds it with a different meaning from the other, and this we will explain today by knowing the opinions of the greats. Interpreters of seeing a golden ring in a dream and what does it mean for good or evil? I dream of a gold ring according to Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about a golden ring? Many interpreters state that this dream comes with its interpretations from the story of our Master Solomon (peace be upon him) and the great kingship he had, meaning that whoever sees Himself wearing a golden ring in his dream can obtain money or a huge, unexpected king. However, there were several other opinions about the dream of a golden ring. We learn them as follows: Interpretation of a dream about a gold ring. If a familiar person gives it to you, you will relate to this person even if you do not You didn't expect it or his feelings towards him were very normal but something new made him love you. The engraving on the ring was also prominent in the dream world. If the inscription is beautiful and dear to the soul, then this indicates the good qualities that the dreamer possesses and makes him enjoy a special status among everyone. But if they are frightening inscriptions, then there are mistakes he commits and leaves their traces without correcting them, or it is likely that he commits sins and disobedience intentionally and does not care about the punishment he receives. And scary shapes. On a gold ring is a warning of bad consequences. Some scholars said that a silver ring in a dream is better than gold. The presence of a clove in a gold ring made of silver or diamond means great sustenance that will come to him. If he is married, he may have a beautiful girl who will fill his life and if he is a single young man, then God will reward him from his generosity and bless him with a good wife. Dream of a gold ring by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin is still the most reliable reference of all in the science of dream interpretation, and he said that wearing a ring is clear signs of his ascension To a position and gain an important position in his society, he can become a king, a ruler, or a scholar according to its specifications in reality. If it is a golden crown, it is a sign of preserving the Holy Qur’an and the religious status he enjoys among the common people. The inscriptions on the fortuneteller’s ring are a sign Although he dreamed and wished a lot, at the same time he worked to achieve his dream without laziness, and now he will reap the result of his efforts and will be able to achieve his dream. Desires and aspirations. In the event that a man goes to sell his ring, he has abandoned his responsibilities and left behind his burdens and only cares about himself, and of course he will only reap loss and the loss of all those who loved him and relatives with him. . Existence.If you receive this ring in a dream as a gift from your master, this is a position that you will enjoy and a great honor that you will receive. As for the pregnant woman who wears it in her dream, she will give birth to a beautiful child with a bright future and it may be a boy. Dream of a gold ring for single peopleThe most promising thing for a girl is that She sees a golden ring in her dream, it is a sign that someone has a relationship with her and wants to marry her, and soon she will be happy with this marriage. But if the ambitions of the visionary are spilled into the crucible

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing termites in a dream?

preview.html: The Hadouta website provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing termites in a dream. It is known that termites or white ants are not ants in the true sense of the word, because the chest and abdomen are directly related to termites. It also feeds mainly on cellulose and lives in colonies in which the colonies differ in structure and function. Also, seeing termites in a dream is completed by what was mentioned about its presence in someone's dreams, as we provided you with what is the interpretation of seeing termites in the house, as well as everything related to the interpretation of the dream. Termites in a dream are full of scholars' books in interpreting dreams and visions. What is the interpretation of seeing the whole earth in a dream? The interpretation of seeing the earth in a dream is full of visions that show a deficiency in everything. Also, seeing termites in a dream indicates some bad things that will happen to the dreamer. Seeing termites eating paper or books in a dream means severe sadness and anxiety. Seeing the earth eating its food in a dream means bad talk and lies. Seeing a lot of termites in a dream is a sign of the annoying problems that a person faces. What is the interpretation of seeing an earthworm in the house? Seeing termites all over the house in a dream indicates concerns that will affect the people of that house. The presence of a floor on the bed in a dream is an undesirable indicator and indicates divorce and problems. Also, seeing the earth leaving the house completely in a dream is a good omen and an end to problems and worries. Eating termites completely in a dream is an unpleasant vision and a sign of calamities and diseases. Interpretation of an insect in a complete dream The dream of killing termites completely is one of the desirable visions and a sign of freedom from worries. Also, seeing insects completely away in The dream indicates a trouble-free, calm and stable life. Seeing termites in a dream is a complete indication of the bad words that this person speaks. Seeing the earth monster in a dream, complete Seeing the earth monster coming out in a dream completely indicates that the news pioneer is spying for the benefit of kings. Seeing the entire earth monster in a dream also indicates enjoining good and forbidding evil. Seeing the entire earth monster in a dream is a good omen and a sign of victory and destruction of enemies. Seeing white worms in a dream complete Interpretation of seeing white worms in a dream is a sign of a life full of goodness. Seeing white worms in a dream also indicates the presence of colorful and evil people in secret. Eating white worms in a dream is full of undesirable visions and indicates anxiety and sadness. title: Ibn Sirin’s most important interpretations of seeing a missile in a dream

preview.html: A missile in a dream is one of the most disturbing and exciting dreams for the dreamer, as it indicates an important event that will occur in his life, as missiles are associated with war, bombing, and the destruction of everything on Earth, so dream interpreters worked hard to analyze them. We interpret this vision, to learn about the most important interpretations related to seeing a projectile in a dream. A missile in a dream. Seeing a missile in a dream indicates the occurrence of many quick things and events in the dreamer’s life. A missile in a dream revolves around the personality of the beholder and the extent of his strength and courage in front of others, and the missile in a dream indicates On the arrival of goodness and blessings. Also, seeing a projectile in a dream indicates a lot of kindness and lawful money flowing to the dreamer from his trade, and the projectile also expresses the dreamer’s good luck and his rise after a long stagnation. Seeing a projectile in a dream means hearing good news about the dreamer. Seeing A missile in a dream is a very rare vision, as it is one of the weapons used in wars, and seeing it may indicate the conflicts that the dreamer is going through with himself, which may be the achievement of life goals. A missile in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing a projectile in a dream is a symbol of the dreamer’s courage. And its power. If the dreamer sees the shell burning and igniting in the dream, this indicates illness and loss of money, and God knows best. In the event that the missile falls on a house, this indicates the presence of corruption and its spread throughout the place. If the dreamer dreams of a missile falling in a house, this is a sign that something Bad things will happen in the country where the dreamer actually lives. If the dreamer sees the burning rocket in his dream, this is a sign that he will be exposed to something bad, or that he will face problems at work. If the dreamer sees the rocket in the sky, this is a promising dream that brings happy news and the appearance of many Good and abundant food. In the case of missile bombing of facilities, this indicates the dreamer’s misfortune and evidence of his evil actions in reality. The missile in Al-Osaimi’s dream. Al-Osaimi interpreted the missile in a dream as a hateful vision, because it expresses the problems that the dreamer faces in his reality, and that these problems will come from Those close to him. If the dreamer sees himself using the missile in his dream and bombing it, this indicates that he will overcome the problems and crises of life that he faces in his reality. The Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet is a site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just write. The Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet. Search for it in Google and get the correct interpretations. The missile in a single woman’s dream. This dream shows a single woman various signals, including the approaching date of her wedding, if she dreams of a war and participates in it. If an unmarried woman sees that she did not participate in the war, this indicates that in reality she will fall into Major crises. But if she dreams of burning missiles, this is good news that she is excelling in her studies and succeeding in her work. He interpreted the dream of a missile falling on the dreamer’s house, indicating that it is a sign of goodness and happiness and changing the situation for the better. If an unmarried woman sees war in her dream

title: Interpretation of a kiss in a dream. The meaning of a kiss in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a kiss and a kiss for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a man, a kiss from the mouth or face, neck, head, hand, foot, and kissing. Ibn Sirin and others died. Interpretation of dreams to see a kiss in a dream. Dreams in the dream of any of us have many meanings and signs, so the person who sees them searches online for the correct interpretation of his vision. Today we will present to you the interpretation of dreams to see a kiss in a dream for single girls, married women, pregnant women, divorced women, and men as well. Interpretation of a kiss in a dream: in a dream, it means satisfying a need and victory over the enemy. Whoever sees that he is kissing a man will get his need, and whoever sees that he kisses a boy, there is affection between him and the boy’s father, and if Kiss. A female slave is honest with her master, and if he kisses a free woman who is honest with her husband, and a man is knowledgeable, then if he kisses a beautiful woman, he reads the words of God Almighty. Whoever sees that God has accepted him, then his work is pleasing to his Lord. Whoever sees that he is kissing a known dead person, he will benefit from the dead person knowing that he left behind him, or money he left behind, or he did something he did in his life that he had not hoped for before. He dies and then receives goodness from the dead or after him. She is in a dream of lust, so she is married and for another desire. The doer accepts the thing and intends to come to it, or asks for it and needs it, if he has made it possible or smiled. He did not push him away from her, and I do not deny that he did that to him. Whoever sees himself kissing a beautiful woman, or having sex with her, will marry a woman whose husband has died, benefit from her money and her child, and do well in that year. It was said: He turns to the world, kissing with desire, then the one who does it. Goodness is derived from the result, and whoever sees that he is kissing a dead man, then he runs the course of marriage in the interpretation. And whoever sees that he is kissing the earth for someone who does not ask him to kiss, there is no good in him, and whoever sees that someone is kissing the earth with a person, then this is a good and high position for the one who kissed it. With desire, he associates him with goodness, and if he sees that the dead person accepts it, then from the dead person’s money or from his work it is sufficient for him that it is good. And whoever sees that he receives something from an animal, then he will tend to love someone who does not have humanity, and whoever sees that he receives something from inanimate objects, then he will tend toward the person of his nature. Like his nature. In front of him was this inanimate object. Seeing a kiss is interpreted as good, beneficial, satisfying a need, victory, and good tidings. The kiss: with desire, overcoming the need, and kissing the boy is an affection between the boy’s father and those before him. And the slave’s kiss is an affection between the one who comes and his master. If he sees himself before the ruler, he takes his place. If he accepts an authority or a judge, then that The authority or judge accepts his words. If the authority or judge accepts them, he will receive good from them, and if he sees that a man kisses between his eyes, he will get married. Interpretation of a kiss in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams that someone she does not know is kissing her forehead, this is evidence of that girl’s need for affection and security, and if An unmarried girl dreams that someone she knows is kissing her forehead, then this is evidence that she will get married or engaged soon. Strong will. Interpretation of a kiss in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that someone she does not know is trying to kiss her while she is kissing.
